message.content: {"given_definition_quality":25,"better_definition":"a measure word for classes or lessons","sentence":"我们班有学生。","image_prompt":"A classroom scene in the soft apocalypse animation style: several diverse students sitting at desks, a simple teacher at the front, and a visible group dynamic that clearly shows a class ('班'). Lighting is dreamlike and colors are pastel, giving a slightly surreal, gentle ruined world atmosphere. The surroundings look slightly worn or abandoned, adding to the soft apocalyptic feel, but everyone is focused on learning.","sentence_translation":"Our class has students."}
